Express Helper

Modules

  • http

Express Helper

Installation

$ npm install express-helper

Usage

const server = require("express-helper");

server.http("./routes", 80,{
  views: "views",
  viewEngine: "ejs",
  static: "static",
  session: {
    use: true,
    name: "sessionId",
    secret: "unknown string",
    resave: false,
    saveUninitialized: true
  },
  authFunction: function(req, res, next) {
    next();
  }
});
